short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click any phone number within Chrome to instantly launch a call on your selected phone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrate OfficeSuite UC® with Google for Work™, Microsoft Dynamics 365®, Microsoft Office 365® and web based CRMs to improve productivity with a seamless unified communications solution.

- Within Chrome, click any phone number on any webpage or web application to instantly launch a call from your OfficeSuite UC extension.
- Receive screen pops whenever receiving an incoming call that links directly to your Google™ Contacts, Microsoft Office 365® Contacts, or your Web based CRM contacts. even when Google Chrome™ is minimized or closed. 
- Access the OfficeSuite UC customer portal directly through Gmail™, Microsoft Dynamics® and Outlook® 365 to manage your voicemails, search your contacts, change your settings and more. 
- Schedule an OfficeSuite HD Meeting® session without ever leaving your email.
